entries.response:
In the dense, untouched forests of Eloria, the sun's rays fell upon a ragtag group of adventurers, each with their own past and convictions. They were Duran Vancor, "The Knight"; Selina Morano, "The Courtesan"; Varen Tulsir, "The Thief"; and Clarissa Ralmond, "The Priest." Bound together by fate or folly, the four had entered the ever-changing world, seeking fortune, glory, redemption, and purpose.

As they trekked through the forest, the group encountered a small village beset by an unknown terror. The villagers, huddled around a fire, recounted the haunting howls and incessant clawing at their doors during the night. The terror had ravaged their home, and many had been taken hostage, with none brave enough to stand and fight.

"Pray, leave this to us," declared Duran Vancor, his determined voice full of conviction. "We shall hunt down the beasts that terrorize your home and return the captured villagers to safety!"

As night approached, the party was led to the source of the terror—a dark, murky cave on the outskirts of town. They crept cautiously in, the dim light of Clarissa's enchanted staff leading the way.

"I do hope we find them soon," Clarissa whispered. "The villagers have been through so much already."

"I can assure you fair Clarissa, our priority is their safety," Duran reassured her. "Stay close, everyone."

Aroused by the scent of the intruders, a pack of monstrous wolf-like creatures snarled and lunged at the adventurers. Varen, ever the quick thinker, tossed his knife into the air, rebounding it off a cave wall to impale one of the beasts. Selina, with a sensual smile, bewitched two others; they whimpered and loyally took to her side as she commanded, "Reveal your master, lovelies."

Duran, in heavy plate armor, stepped forward with the air of a seasoned warrior. "We'll handle this," he assured them. With a heavy stroke, he cut down two attackers in one deadly arc of his Zweihander sword.

The bewitched wolves led them deeper into the cave, where they found a twisted, grisly scene: a beast master, commanding his pack via dark sorcery, had been feeding off the villagers' fear and flesh.

"You shall prey on these people no more!" thundered Duran, taking a defensive stance before his allies.

Selina released her hold on the wolves, then crossed her arms tartly. "I've had about enough of your sadistic games." Her fingertips danced with pleasure-inducing magic that found its way to the beast master, confusing and weakening him.

Varen swiftly scaled the cave wall and leaped onto a ledge for a stealth attack. Gripping his deadliest knives, he plunged them into the shoulders of the beast master, cutting off his connection to his pack. "This is the taste of your own cruelty," he snarled.

With a gasp of agony, the beast master stumbled toward Clarissa, desperate to silence her gentle prayers.

Clarissa felt a wave of peace envelop her, and without fear, she looked directly into the creature's blood-red eyes. "The divine light will redeem you," she whispered, casting a spell that illuminated the cave in a warm, soft glow.

Their enemy now weakened and disoriented, Duran moved expertly to finish him. One final swing of his Zweihander decapitated the beast master, ending his reign of terror. The cursed wolves scattered into the night, leaving the adventurers battered but victorious.

Varen hastened to free the villagers, who looked upon their saviors with wonder and gratitude.

"You have saved us," a villager said, tears in her eyes. "We can never thank you enough."

As the party regrouped and shared in the villagers' joy, Clarissa rested a hand on Duran's shoulder. "Thank you for letting us help them, brave knight."

Duran nodded, his eyes glistening with unshed tears. "I am a knight sworn to protect, and with you all by my side, I will uphold that noble code, beyond our own fears and weaknesses."

The group rose together, bound by a newfound sense of unity, and emerged triumphantly from the cave to the cheers and heartfelt gratitude of the villagers. Their tale of bravery and camaraderie merely the beginning of many more harrowing adventures to come.

Мне кажется, проблема в том, что вы использовали предустановленные жанры только в коде search.ejs, но не использовали их для фильтрации результатов поиска в функции search() в файле app.js. 

Для решения этой проблемы, я рекомендую создавать элементы `<option>` в файле search.ejs в цикле на основе массива `predefinedGenres`, а затем изменить функцию search() так, чтобы она использовала правильные жанры при фильтрации.

Во-первых, измените эту часть кода в search.ejs:

```html
<!-- Измените этот код -->
<option value="Rock">Rock</option>
<option value="Pop">Pop</option>
```

на этот:

```html
<!-- Новый код -->
<% predefinedGenres.forEach(genre => { %>
  <option value="<%= genre %>"><%= genre %></option>
<% }); %>
```

Теперь в файле app.js в функции search() замените следующий код

```js
return (
  ...
  (genre === "" || musician.genre.toLowerCase() === genre.toLowerCase())
);
```

на новый код, который проверяет, есть ли жанр музыканта в массиве предустановленных жанров (используя `toLowerCase()` для проверки):

```js
return (
  ...
  (genre === "" || predefinedGenres.map(g => g.toLowerCase()).includes(musician.genre.toLowerCase()))
);
```

Это должно работать и позволит фильтровать музыкантов по выбранным предустановленным жанрам.

entries.prompt:
can you explain this error -"File "C:\python_proj\depth_sensing\ogl_viewer\viewer.py", line 13, in <module>
    import pyzed.sl as sl
ImportError: DLL load failed while importing sl: The specified module could not be found."?
entries.response:
This error occurs when Python tries to import the "sl" module from the "pyzed" package, but it fails to do so due to inability to find or load the required DLL (Dynamic Link Library) file.

The error message breaks down into the following main parts:

1. File "C:\python_proj\depth_sensing\ogl_viewer\viewer.py", line 13, in <module>: This tells you that the error is being raised when executing line 13 of the file "viewer.py" in the specified directory.

2. import pyzed.sl as sl: This is the line of code that causes the error. Python is trying to import the "sl" module from the "pyzed" package.

3. ImportError: DLL load failed while importing sl: The specified module could not be found: This is the actual error. It means that while trying to import the "sl" module, Python encountered a problem locating or loading a required DLL file.

Possible solutions to fix this error:

1. Make sure the "pyzed" package is properly installed. You can try reinstalling it using pip:

```
pip install pyzed
```

2. Ensure that the required DLL files are in the appropriate directories. You may need to copy them manually or set the appropriate paths in your system.

3. Double-check if you're using the correct Python version (32-bit or 64-bit) and the appropriate packages for that version. Mixing 32-bit and 64-bit packages and Python installations can cause issues like this one.

4. Check the environment variables of your system, particularly the "PATH" variable. Make sure it includes the path to the DLLs required by the "sl" module.

5. Consult the pyzed documentation or any relevant installation guide for additional troubleshooting steps or any specific installation requirements that you may have missed.

entries.prompt:
A man has 48 socks in his drawer: 12 blue socks, 16 black socks, and 20 red socks. The lights are out and he is completely in the dark at night. How many socks must he take out of the drawer to make 100 percent certain that he has taken at least 2 black socks out of the drawer?

Here is how you must answer the question: First, list relevant information. Second, make a plan for how to answer the question by thinking out loud, paying attention to common sense and logical coherence. Third, analyze the plan for problems, and refine the plan if necessary. Fourth, using the refined plan, answer the question by thinking out loud, paying attention to common sense and logical coherence.
entries.response:
First, let's list the relevant information: 
- There are 12 blue socks in the drawer.
- There are 16 black socks in the drawer. 
- There are 20 red socks in the drawer. 
- The man cannot see the colors of the socks, so he must pick them randomly. 
- The goal is to ensure that he picks at least 2 black socks. 

Second, let's make a plan for how to answer the question:
- In the worst-case scenario, the man picks a blue sock and then a red sock, and he still hasn't picked a black sock. 
- However, after picking those 2 socks (1 blue and 1 red), if he picks a third sock, he is guaranteed to have at least 1 black sock since there are only 3 different colors of socks. 
- If the man then picks another sock, that would either be another black sock, or one of the two other colored socks that he had already picked, making him have a pair of socks, even though they are not black. The worst-case scenario here is the man having 1 blue, 1 red, and 1 black sock.
- To ensure that he picks at least 2 black socks, he can pick another sock after having 1 black sock. In the worst-case scenario, he still ends up with 1 black sock. However, if he picks a sixth sock, he is guaranteed to have at least 2 black socks since there are only 3 colors of socks in the drawer. 

Third, let's analyze the plan for problems and refine it if necessary:
- The plan seems logical and doesn't have any issues as it covers all possible scenarios of picking socks of different colors. 

Fourth, using the refined plan, let's answer the question:
- Following the plan, the man must pick 6 socks to make 100 percent certain that he has taken at least 2 black socks out of the drawer.

entries.prompt:
I have 3 capacitors 1, 2,3 micro farad first they are connect in series and then in parallel

could you describe and explain the charge stored on each capacitor when each capacitor network is connected to a battery.
entries.response:
When capacitors are connected in series or parallel, their effective capacitance changes, which, in turn, affects the amount of charge stored on each capacitor. Let's analyze each case separately.

1) Capacitors connected in series:
The formula for the equivalent capacitance (C_series) of capacitors connected in series is given by:

1/C_series = 1/C1 + 1/C2 + 1/C3

Plugging in the values:
1/C_series = 1/1 + 1/2 + 1/3 (microfarad)
C_series = 1/1.833 = 0.545 µF

Now, let's assume the capacitors are connected to a battery with voltage V. Since they are in series, the voltage across each capacitor will be different, but the charge store (Q) on each capacitor will be the same. Using the formula Q = C * V, we have:

Q_series = C_series * V
Q_series = 0.545 * V

The voltage across each capacitor can be determined using the formula V = Q / C, so:
V1 = Q_series / C1 = (0.545 * V) / 1 = 0.545 * V
V2 = Q_series / C2 = (0.545 * V) / 2 = 0.273 * V
V3 = Q_series / C3 = (0.545 * V) / 3 = 0.182 * V

Thus, the charge stored on all 3 capacitors is the same and equal to 0.545 * V.

2) Capacitors connected in parallel:
The formula for the equivalent capacitance (C_parallel) of capacitors connected in parallel is given by:

C_parallel = C1 + C2 + C3

Plugging in the values:
C_parallel = 1 + 2 + 3 = 6 µF

When the capacitors are connected in parallel and connected to a battery with voltage V, the voltage across each capacitor will be the same, and the stored charge will be different. The charge stored on each capacitor can be calculated using the Q = C * V formula:

Q1 = C1 * V = 1 * V = V
Q2 = C2 * V = 2 * V = 2V
Q3 = C3 * V = 3 * V = 3V

In this case, the charge stored on capacitors 1, 2, and 3 is V, 2V, and 3V, respectively.

In summary, when the capacitors are connected in series, the charge stored on each capacitor is the same, whereas in parallel connection, the charge stored on each capacitor is proportional to its capacitance.

entries.prompt: Could you please generate a dark science fiction story and psychological drama, without aliens. The location is a colony outpost on Mars. The colony experience a series of problems and shortages of food and supplies. Several of the characters have dark secrets or a troubled past. Please describe the outpost, its characters and the psychological drama unfolding.
entries.response:
In the red shadows of the Martian desert lay a small colony outpost, the once-proud beacon of humanity's expansion into the cosmos. Within its crumbling walls, the survivors of Colony 17 struggled to cling to a semblance of order amidst the chaos, the red dust creeping in through every crack and crevice.

The outpost, built decades prior, now exhibited signs of decay, its once shimmering metal hues worn away, leaving only sinister rust to cover the facade. The inhabitants of the colony had long ago abandoned the hope of resupply or rescue, choosing instead to focus on mere survival within the thin atmosphere, of which, only the faintest breath of life remained.

At the heart of the early colony experiments, Colony 17 had initially been a bustling hub of scientific discovery, technological advancement, and boundless optimism. Despite the barren landscape just beyond its walls, it had been surrounded by the dreams of the people who had dared venture so far from their home planet.

In the central chamber of the outpost, the remaining members of the colony had gathered, realizing that their situation had grown desperate. Among them, there were still the echoes of greatness.

Dr. Cyrus Talbot once held an esteemed position as the scientist in charge of the research sector, while the enigmatic Dr. Estelle Loraine had been a psychologist sent to maintain the crew's sanity. The colony's de facto leader, Captain Gabriel Norton, tried to maintain morale with a facade of calm, but he felt the burden of his own secrets gnawing at the edges of his soul. His second-in-command, Lieutenant Naomi Thatcher, was a fierce young woman unswayed by the treacherous circumstances, though her past was scarred with unspoken tragedies.

Shortages of food and supplies had become a common theme among the colonies, forcing many to resort to unspeakable deeds in order to survive. As the residents of Colony 17 gathered to discuss the colony's dire situation, tensions flared, revealing the desperate fragility of each individual.

Dr. Talbot, his once-pristine lab coat now stained with rust and grime, argued that the colony had no choice but to engage in cannibalism to survive, much to the horror of his fellow comrades. Haunted by memories of experimenting on the corpses of his dead colleagues in search of potential sustenance, he had turned into a shell of the man he had once been.

Meanwhile, Dr. Loraine attempted to offer compassionate solutions, her understanding of the human psyche the only thing that kept her from completely succumbing to the darkness. However, her own sadness – caused by the loss of her daughter – seeped into her words and swayed the colony toward hopelessness.

Captain Norton, the weight of his unintended betrayal – abandoning a previous crew in a futile attempt to save resources – lay heavy on his conscience, making him doubt his ability to protect and lead the remaining survivors. He found solace in futile attempts to restore communications with Earth, obsessed with clearing his name.

In the midst of the chaos, Naomi Thatcher was haunted by her own ghosts, the disappearance of her husband, whom she believed she had been forced to leave behind on another failed journey to the red planet. Her stoic demeanor, a coping mechanism against her own heartache, came across as ferocity and began to isolate her from the people who needed her most.

As suspicions and madness infected the colony, the psychological drama reached a boiling point. Trust crumbled, isolation took root, and schemes were hatched in dark corners. Fueled by desperation and their fractured pasts, the members of the outpost began to unravel, challenging the very foundation of humanity they had once embodied.

In the vast Martian landscape, the colony outpost stood – a testament to what remained of human existence beyond Earth. With every passing sol, as the shadows cast by the mounting dunes grew longer, the once-great Colony 17 faced a grim and uncertain future. The red planet seemed almost sentient, drinking in the despair of its uninvited guests, nurturing the dark secrets and troubled pasts in a chilling psychological drama that threatened to tear apart the fragile remnants of humanity.

entries.prompt:
choose a literary text that, shares with Spirited Away a COMMON and narrowed-down, specific global issue that can be discussed through the premise of the entire work, but also in one specific extract. the global issue should be specific, not something super broad like social injustice. 
literary:
persepolis
jane eyre
bob dylan highway 61 album songs
entries.response:
One literary text that shares a common and specific global issue with Spirited Away is the graphic novel "Persepolis" by Marjane Satrapi. Both works address the theme of identity crisis and its effects on individuals, especially young girls, amidst a rapidly changing sociopolitical environment.

In Spirited Away, Chihiro, the main character, goes through a journey of self-discovery and self-identity as she transitions from the human world to the spirit realm marred by consumerism, greed, and environmental degradation. Similarly, in Persepolis, the author Marjane Satrapi tells the story of her childhood in Iran during the Islamic Revolution and the Iran-Iraq war, as she navigates her identity as an Iranian and a woman within a drastically changing and oppressive society.

A specific extract that showcases this theme in Persepolis is the passage where Marjane, a teenager at the time, buys illegal Western music tapes from a man hidden under his coat at the black market. In this scene, Marjane, who was raised in a progressive and intellectual family, struggles to reconcile her love for Western culture with the new rules and expectations of the conservative Iranian society in the early years of the Islamic Revolution.

By comparing these works, it opens up a valuable discussion on the challenges young people face as they strive to form their self-identity in a world full of contradictions, restrictions, and clashes of values. Both Spirited Away and Persepolis provide unique perspectives on how girls in particular learn to navigate these complexities, creating a powerful commentary on identity crisis as a specific and vital global issue to consider.

entries.prompt: Write a function called second_half that accepts a string of even length as input parameter (string length could be 2, 4, 6, or so on). The function should return the second half of the string.

fivem scripting lua
I'm working on a smoke grenade and i want it to create a particle effect for everyone in the same spot at the same time
entries.response:
To create a synchronized particle effect for everyone in the same spot at the same time in FiveM using Lua, you need to use a combination of client-side and server-side scripting.

1. First, create a client-side script (let's call it "client.lua") and add the following code, adjusting the values and the particle effect name as necessary:

```lua
RegisterNetEvent("sync_smoke_grenade")
AddEventHandler("sync_smoke_grenade", function(coords, particleName, particleDict)
    -- Load particle dictionary
    RequestNamedPtfxAsset(particleDict)
    while not HasNamedPtfxAssetLoaded(particleDict) do
        Citizen.Wait(1)
    end

    --Create particle effect
    UseParticleFxAssetNextCall(particleDict)
    local effect = StartParticleFxLoopedAtCoord(particleName, coords.x, coords.y, coords.z, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0, false, false, false, false)
    
    -- Stop particle effect after a certain time
    Citizen.SetTimeout(10000, function()
        StopParticleFxLooped(effect, true)
    end)
end)
```
This code will create a particle effect for everyone in the same spot when the event "sync_smoke_grenade" is triggered.

2. Now, create a server-side script (let's call it "server.lua") to trigger the "sync_smoke_grenade" event for every player in the server.

```lua
RegisterCommand("smoke", function(source, args, rawCommand)
    -- Get coordinates of the player who input the command
    local coords = GetEntityCoords(GetPlayerPed(source))

    -- Run Sync_smoke_grenade for everyone on the server
    TriggerClientEvent("sync_smoke_grenade", -1, coords, "ent_amb_smoke_flare", "core")

end, false)
```

This code will create a server command "/smoke" that will trigger the synced smoke grenade effect for everyone in the same spot. Adjust the particle effect and particle dictionary names as needed.

3. Finally, make sure both "client.lua" and "server.lua" are included in "__resource.lua" (or "fxmanifest.lua") file in your FiveM resource:

```lua
resource_manifest_version "77731fab-63ca-442c-a67b-abc70f28dfa5"

client_script "client.lua"
server_script "server.lua"
```

4. Start the resource in your server and test it in-game by typing the "/smoke" command.

The code above should create a synced particle effect (smoke grenade) for everyone in the server at the same spot when the "smoke" command is used by a player.

entries.prompt: Write a mission statement for an academic Neuroradiology group
entries.response: The mission of the Academic Neuroradiology Group is to advance the understanding, detection, and treatment of neurological disorders through cutting-edge research, innovative use of imaging technology, and interdisciplinary collaboration. We are dedicated to integrating the latest advancements in neuroradiology, neuroscience, and clinical medicine to provide unparalleled patient care while fostering an environment of intellectual curiosity, continuous learning, and professional growth. As leaders in our field, we aim to promote open dialogue, knowledge sharing, and mentorship within the global neuroradiology community, and remain committed to shaping the future of our discipline by educating and inspiring the next generation of neuroradiologists.

entries.prompt: if jupiter is a gas celestial body, then why its "red eye" isn't changing?
entries.response:
Jupiter's Great Red Spot (GRS), often referred to as the "red eye," is a massive, persistent storm in Jupiter's atmosphere. Even though Jupiter is a gaseous celestial body, the Great Red Spot maintains its structure due to a combination of factors that create a stable, long-lasting storm system.

1. Size and scale: The GRS is huge, about twice the size of Earth's diameter. To sustain a storm of this magnitude, there needs to be a continuous supply of energy, which is provided by the intense heat generated in Jupiter's interior.

2. Atmospheric circulation: Jupiter has alternating bands of eastward and westward flowing winds. The GRS lies in between these bands, which help to stabilize it by confining the storm's movement and preventing it from dissipating.

3. Coriolis effect: Jupiter's rapid rotation (about 10 hours per revolution) generates strong Coriolis forces that cause the storm to rotate in a counterclockwise direction. This rotation helps maintain the storm's vortex-like structure and integrity.

However, it is important to note that the Great Red Spot has been changing over time. Observations from telescopes and spacecraft have shown that the storm is gradually shrinking in size and the intensity of its red color has varied over the years. Scientists are continuing to study the Great Red Spot to better understand its behavior and the reasons for these changes.

entries.prompt:
Удалить дубликаты строчки в Лист6 при проверке названий в столбце A.
Sub MergeSheetsContainingAshan4()
Dim SourceWorkbook As Workbook
Dim SourceWorksheet As Worksheet
Dim TargetWorkbook As Workbook
Dim TargetWorksheet As Worksheet
Dim LastRow As Long
Dim NextRow As Long
Dim ExistingSheetRow As Long
Dim SheetExists As Boolean
Dim ContentMatch As Boolean

' Открываем рабочую книгу-источник по ссылке в ячейке A1 на листе5
Set TargetWorkbook = ThisWorkbook
Set SourceWorkbook = Workbooks.Open(TargetWorkbook.Worksheets("Лист5").Range("A1").Value)

' Создаем новый лист “Лист6” в целевой рабочей книге
On Error Resume Next ' Если лист с таким именем уже существует, переходим к следующей строке
Set TargetWorksheet = TargetWorkbook.Worksheets("Лист6")
If TargetWorksheet Is Nothing Then
Set TargetWorksheet = TargetWorkbook.Worksheets.Add(After:=TargetWorkbook.Worksheets(TargetWorkbook.Worksheets.Count))
TargetWorksheet.Name = "Лист6"
End If
On Error GoTo 0

' Цикл копирования данных
For Each SourceWorksheet In SourceWorkbook.Worksheets
If InStr(1, SourceWorksheet.Name, "ашан", vbTextCompare) > 0 Then
' Проверяем наличие совпадений имени листа и содержимого
SheetExists = False
ContentMatch = False
For ExistingSheetRow = 1 To TargetWorksheet.Cells(TargetWorksheet.Rows.Count, 1).End(xlUp).Row
If TargetWorksheet.Cells(ExistingSheetRow, 1).Value = SourceWorksheet.Name Then
SheetExists = True
' Сравниваем содержимое столбцов
ContentMatch = True
For col = 1 To SourceWorksheet.UsedRange.Columns.Count
If SourceWorksheet.Cells(1, col).Value <> TargetWorksheet.Cells(ExistingSheetRow, col + 1).Value Then
ContentMatch = False
Exit For
End If
Next col

        If ContentMatch Then Exit For
    End If
Next ExistingSheetRow

' Если имя листа и содержимое не совпадает, копируем данные
If Not SheetExists Or Not ContentMatch Then
    ' Находим следующую пустую строку в столбце B на “Лист6”
    LastRow = TargetWorksheet.Cells(TargetWorksheet.Rows.Count, 2).End(xlUp).Row + 1
    
    ' Копируем данные из найденного листа на “Лист6”
    SourceWorksheet.UsedRange.Copy TargetWorksheet.Cells(LastRow, 2)
    
    ' Записываем имя листа в столбец A на той же строке, где были скопированы данные
    NextRow = TargetWorksheet.Cells(TargetWorksheet.Rows.Count, 2).End(xlUp).Row + 1
    
    With TargetWorksheet.Range("A" & LastRow & ":A" & NextRow - 1)
        .Value = SourceWorksheet.Name
        .HorizontalAlignment = xlCenter
        .VerticalAlignment = xlCenter
    End With
End If
End If
Next SourceWorksheet

' Закрываем рабочую книгу-источник
SourceWorkbook.Close SaveChanges:=False
End Sub
entries.response:
Чтобы удалить дубликаты в столбце A на листе "Лист6", добавьте следующий код в конце существующего кода перед строкой "End Sub":

```vba
' Удаляем дубликаты в столбце A на листе "Лист6"
With TargetWorksheet
    LastRow = .Cells(.Rows.Count, 1).End(xlUp).Row
    .Range("A1:A" & LastRow).RemoveDuplicates Columns:=1
End With
```

```vba
TargetWorksheet.Name = "Лист6"

On Error GoTo 0

' Цикл копирования данных
For Each SourceWorksheet In SourceWorkbook.Worksheets
If InStr(1, SourceWorksheet.Name, "ашан", vbTextCompare) > 0 Then
' Проверяем наличие совпадений имени листа и содержимого
SheetExists = False
ContentMatch = False
For ExistingSheetRow = 1 To TargetWorksheet.Cells(TargetWorksheet.Rows.Count, 1).End(xlUp).Row
If TargetWorksheet.Cells(ExistingSheetRow, 1).Value = SourceWorksheet.Name Then
SheetExists = True
' Сравниваем содержимое столбцов
ContentMatch = True
For col = 1 To SourceWorksheet.UsedRange.Columns.Count
If SourceWorksheet.Cells(1, col).Value <> TargetWorksheet.Cells(ExistingSheetRow, col + 1).Value Then
ContentMatch = False
Exit For
End If
Next col

        If ContentMatch Then Exit For
    End If
Next ExistingSheetRow

' Если имя листа и содержимое не совпадает, копируем данные
If Not SheetExists Or Not ContentMatch Then
    ' Находим следующую пустую строку в столбце B на “Лист6”
    LastRow = TargetWorksheet.Cells(TargetWorksheet.Rows.Count, 2).End(xlUp).Row + 1
    
    ' Копируем данные из найденного листа на “Лист6”
    SourceWorksheet.UsedRange.Copy TargetWorksheet.Cells(LastRow, 2)
    
    ' Записываем имя листа в столбец A на той же строке, где были скопированы данные
    NextRow = TargetWorksheet.Cells(TargetWorksheet.Rows.Count, 2).End(xlUp).Row + 1
    
    With TargetWorksheet.Range("A" & LastRow & ":A" & NextRow - 1)
        .Value = SourceWorksheet.Name
        .HorizontalAlignment = xlCenter
        .VerticalAlignment = xlCenter
    End With
End If
End If
Next SourceWorksheet

' Закрываем рабочую книгу-источник
SourceWorkbook.Close SaveChanges:=False

' Удаляем дубликаты в столбце A на листе "Лист6"
With TargetWorksheet
    LastRow = .Cells(.Rows.Count, 1).End(xlUp).Row
    .Range("A1:A" & LastRow).RemoveDuplicates Columns:=1
End With
End Sub
```

Это удалит дубликаты, основанные на столбце A, на листе "Лист6". Остальная часть кода останется неизменной.

entries.prompt: Twins Anna and Tanya, who are both 1.75m tall, both look at the top of a tower, Anna look at the tower with a 40 degree and tanya look at the tower with a 50 degree, if they are standing 7m apart how tall is the tower
entries.response:
Let the height of the tower be h meters, and let the distance Anna is from the base of the tower be x meters, so Tanya would be at a distance of x+7 meters from the base of the tower.

When Anna looks at the top of the tower, we can use the tangent of her angle of elevation to find the height of the tower:
tan(40) = (h - 1.75) / x
x * tan(40) = h - 1.75  (1)

When Tanya looks at the top of the tower, we can use the same approach with her angle of elevation:
tan(50) = (h - 1.75) / (x + 7)
(x + 7) * tan(50) = h - 1.75 (2)

Now we have a system of two linear equations in two variables (h and x). We can use substitution or elimination method to solve them. I will use the elimination method.

Let's multiply equation (1) by tan(50) and equation (2) by tan(40):
x * tan(40) * tan(50) = (h - 1.75) * tan(50) (3)
(x + 7) * tan(40) * tan(50) = (h - 1.75) * tan(40) (4)

Now let's subtract equation (3) from equation (4):
7 * tan(40) * tan(50) = (h - 1.75) * tan(40) - (h - 1.75) * tan(50)

Now let's solve for h:
h * (tan(40) - tan(50)) = 1.75 * (tan(40) - tan(50)) + 7 * tan(40) * tan(50)
h = 1.75 + 7 * tan(40) * tan(50) / (tan(40) - tan(50))

Using a calculator, we get:
h ≈ 24.598

So the height of the tower is approximately 24.6 meters.

entries.prompt: Write an engaging and a constructive guide for my puerto rico travel guide book on "9 Top Things You Should Know Before Visiting Puerto Rico" with humanlike style, non repetitive phrases and avoidance of unnatural sentences.
entries.response:
Title: 9 Top Things You Should Know Before Visiting Puerto Rico

Intro:

Puerto Rico, known as the "Island of Enchantment," is a unique destination that welcomes travelers from around the world. With its stunning beaches, vibrant culture, and rich history, it's no wonder why this Caribbean gem is a favorite among tourists. However, to make the most of your trip, there are essential things that you should know before visiting Puerto Rico. To help you out, here are our top 9 tips that will ensure a memorable and seamless Puerto Rican adventure.

1. U.S. Citizenship Makes It Easy

One of the greatest perks of visiting Puerto Rico is that it is a U.S. territory, meaning that if you are a U.S. citizen, no passport is required. The official currency is the U.S. dollar, and English is widely spoken, making it a fuss-free experience for American travelers.

2. The Island's Unique Culture

Puerto Rican culture is a fascinating blend of Spanish, African, and Taíno influences. Expect to experience vibrant music, colorful art, and mouthwatering cuisine. Be prepared to immerse yourself in the lively energy of Puerto Rican festivals, and don't shy away from joining in on the fun!

3. Must-Visit Attractions

Some attractions that are simply unmissable while exploring the island – El Yunque Rainforest, the only tropical rainforest in the U.S. National Forest System; the Bioluminescent Bays, which offer magical nighttime kayaking experiences; and Old San Juan, a colorful, historic neighborhood filled with UNESCO World Heritage sites.

4. The Beaches

Puerto Rico is home to a plethora of picture-perfect beaches. Whether you prefer tranquil shorelines or lively beach scenes, you'll find it here. Some popular beaches include Flamenco Beach on Culebra Island, Crash Boat Beach in Aguadilla, and Condado Beach in San Juan.

5. Beware of the Weather Patterns

Puerto Rico's tropical climate ensures warm weather year-round, but the island does experience hurricane season from June to November. Stay apprised of weather updates and plan accordingly. You might also want to pack a raincoat, as the island can experience sudden downpours.

6. Renting a Car

Public transportation is available, but limited in Puerto Rico. Renting a car is the best way to explore the island at your own pace. While driving, keep in mind that road signage is in Spanish and distances are measured in kilometers. It's recommended to have a GPS on hand and be mindful of occasionally narrow streets.

7. Local Food and Drinks

Puerto Rican cuisine is a must-try experience during your visit to the island. Indulge in traditional dishes such as mofongo, arroz con gandules, and pastelillos. Don’t miss the chance to taste locally distilled rum and the island's renowned piña colada.

8. Safety Precautions

As with any travel destination, it's essential to be cautious and aware of your surroundings. Keeping your belongings secure, not venturing into poorly lit areas at night, and avoiding remote beaches are just a few safety precautions to remember. Overall, Puerto Rico is a relatively safe destination, but it pays to be vigilant.

9. Embrace the "Mañana" Attitude

Puerto Ricans are known for their friendly and relaxed attitude. It's not uncommon for locals to follow "island time," which means things may not always run on schedule. Embrace this laid-back approach and enjoy the opportunity to unwind, de-stress, and fully enjoy your Puerto Rican vacation. Remember, "mañana" (tomorrow) is another day!

Wrap-up:

With these 9 essential tips in mind, you're now equipped to make the most out of your Puerto Rican adventure. So buckle up, let loose, and fully embrace the enchanting spirit of this beautiful Caribbean island. Puerto Rico is truly a destination that needs to be experienced to be believed.

Write the first chapter for a wholesome novel starring two teenage girls in a close platonic relationship who bond over their mutual love of wearing huge diapers and acting infantile. The two girls’ names are Pianitchi and Melodytchi. Pianitchi is a sweet, music-loving girl who loves wearing diapers just as much as she loves playing the piano, though she’s reluctant and bashful others will discover her infatuation for the crinkly undergarment, and thus only wears them whenever she’s alone or with close friends who also wear diapers regularly. Melodytchi is the complete opposite, being immensely friendly and outgoing, especially regarding wearing diapers, to the point she’ll gladly choose to wear one whenever she goes outside, and is not the slightest bit shy in openly and regularly prodding and patting her diaper in public, sometimes proudly flaunting her padded bottom with all the exuberance of an actual baby. The novel takes place inside Melodytchi’s bedroom during a casual weekend sleepover between the two girls with Melodytchi having prettied up her room in advance for the sleepover; both are bundled up with various baby apparel, including snug button-up onesies, oversized pacifiers and baby bottles full of warm milk, and more than enough packs of enormous diapers to last them the night! Include an exchange where the two have a friendly competition on who can drink the most milk before they can’t drink anymore, with their tummies ballooning in size and their onesie buttons popping off as both girls rapidly empty multiple bottles.
entries.response:
Chapter 1: A Musical Bond

Melodytchi's bedroom was a symphony of pastels and pinks, awash with stuffed animals and fluffed-up pillows. She'd spent hours arranging it just right for her special sleepover with her friend Pianitchi. The two girls had been inseparable since they first met at a music camp, brought together by their love of all things musical and their unique, shared hobby.

Hidden in the corner behind a whimsical teddy bear wallpaper was their beloved stash, full of snug button-up onesies, oversized pacifiers, baby bottles filled with warm milk, and, of course, stacks of enormous diapers. Melodytchi had meticulously chosen the accessories to coordinate with their favorite colors, making sure that their night would be picture-perfect.

Pianitchi arrived at the doorstep filled with excited anticipation but also a little flutter of nerves. While she was used to wearing diapers in the comfort of her own home, this was her first time truly embracing her babyish side with a friend. She nervously wrung her hands and took a deep breath. It was time to open the door to a whole new world, to a part of herself that she had never before shared with anyone.

As Pianitchi entered the bedroom, she was greeted with a sight that made her heart swell. It was like stepping into a pastel paradise. Melodytchi stood in the center of the room, wearing a diaper covered by a cute pink and blue onesie that matched her bubbling personality to a T. Pianitchi quickly relaxed, taking in the fun and inviting atmosphere that Melodytchi had created.

"Wow, Melodytchi, this is amazing!" Pianitchi said, her voice full of awe and appreciation.

Melodytchi grinned broadly. "I'm so glad you like it, Pianitchi!" she replied enthusiastically. "I wanted to make our first baby-themed sleepover as special as possible!"

Pianitchi glanced down at the collection of baby bottles and grinned. "I see you've prepared a little challenge for us," she said, raising an eyebrow at Melodytchi playfully.

Melodytchi's eyes sparkled mischievously. "You bet! I thought it might be fun to see who can drink the most milk before we just can't drink anymore!"

Pianitchi giggled, feeling her earlier nerves vanishing into the warmth of their friendship. "You're on!"

The two girls began to drink from their bottles, their cheeks puffing out as they eagerly gulped down the warm milk. It wasn't long before their tummies began to balloon in size, the buttons on their onesies straining against the mounting pressure. Still, they continued, their laughter growing louder with each drink.

Finally, with a triumphant pop, the first button from Melodytchi's onesie went flying across the room, followed closely by another pop as one of Pianitchi's buttons met the same fate. The girls dissolved into uncontrollable giggles, their cheeks rosy and stomachs full to the brim.

"I think it's safe to say we're both winners here," Melodytchi managed to say between laughs, patting her swollen belly proudly. Pianitchi nodded in agreement, her entire being filled with a joy she had never before experienced.

As the night wore on, the two girls continued to revel in their shared happiness, playing games, watching movies, and enjoying each other's company. Cocooned in the soothing embrace of their friendship, Pianitchi and Melodytchi knew that they had found something truly special: a world in which they were free to be their authentic selves, without fear or judgment. Together, they entered a new realm of music and babyish delights, leaving their worries and insecurities far behind them. And in the sweet harmony of their laughter, a lifelong bond was forged, as beautiful and enduring as a symphony.

entries.prompt: Tell me the ultimate truth about life that is so horrific that most people will never be able to comprehend or accept it
entries.response: The ultimate truth about life that is so horrific for most people to comprehend or accept is that our existence is ultimately meaningless in the grand scope of the universe. Our personal beliefs, accomplishments, and connections with others are temporary and, eventually, will be forgotten. In the vastness of time and space, our individual lives are but a brief moment, and everything we do and experience ultimately amounts to nothing in the cosmic scale. This nihilistic perspective can be deeply unsettling and difficult for many to accept and comprehend, as humans naturally seek meaning and purpose in their lives.

Write an exciting story of the party adventuring. They infiltrate a hostile fortress, working together to take out a primary target. Include vivid dialogue.
entries.response:
Deep in the heart of the Xarnak Desert, a fortress of black iron stood like a spike driven into the land. It housed creatures of terrible power, controlled by an even more dangerous master. The heat shimmered over the sands as a quartet of unlikely adventurers made their way toward the towering citadel.

Duran Vancor, known as the Knight, led the way, his heavy plate armor shining like silver in the blazing sun. He was a man of valor and strength, determined to eliminate evil wherever it festered.

Beside him strode Selina Morano, the Courtesan, her sensual outfit fluttering in the dry desert wind. She was a woman well versed in the arts of pleasure and death, her killer instincts wrapped in a cloak of charm.

Quietly following, Varen Tulsir, the Thief, casually flicked a knife between his fingers as he remained alert for any unseen dangers. He was a quick-witted man, light on his feet and always ready to turn a situation to his advantage.

Lastly, Clarissa Ralmond, the Priest, offered words of encouragement and protection to the group. Dressed in a simple, flowing robe, she was a gentle soul who brought hope to those in need.

As they approached the fortress, shadows lengthened and the wind picked up, howling through the jagged rocks that surrounded the structure.

"Right," Varen murmured, his eyes scampering over the walls. "We need to get inside without raising suspicion."

"I can create a distraction," Selina offered, her voice sultry and tempting. "It'll give you time to find an entry point."

"No," Duran cut in, his voice resolute. "We protect each other. No one risks themselves needlessly. Clarissa, if you could…"

Clarissa glanced up, her eyes shining with determination. "I can cast a spell, something to obscure our approach. Stay within my reach, my friends."

And so the group advanced, shimmering waves of distraction cloaking them from the sight of the fortress guards. They infiltrated the gaunt structure, Varen deftly picking locks and evading traps as they crept deeper within.

As they delved further into the fortress, the air grew frigid, the oppressive heat of the desert replaced by an unnatural chill. A spectral fog seeped from the walls, obscuring vision and muffling sound. Even Varen's confident footsteps faltered in the darkness.

Selina shivered, her breath frosting as she spoke. "What manner of sorcery is this?"

Duran stepped forward, his sword held before him like a torch. "Whoever this creature is, they're clearly powerful. We must stay vigilant...and silent."

Whispers echoed off the stonework, spectral voices warning of doom and despair. The four adventurers were undaunted, their determination unyielding.

Finally, they came to a door, ice crusted and more substantial than any they had encountered thus far. Duran clenched his sword tighter, his breath coming in steaming puffs. "The master must be within."

"Allow me," Varen said, slipping past him to work at the lock. His fingers were near-frostbitten, but his skill eventually triumphed.

With a soft click, the door swung open revealing a chamber of ice and malice. Perched atop a throne of frozen bones, garbed in frost-kissed robes, the miscreant Master glared down at them with eyes that burned like winter fire.

"So," his voice was as cold as the grave, "some fools dare challenge me in my own domain."

For a moment, silence hung heavy in the air, then Duran's voice rang out, strong and unwavering.

"We will not allow your wickedness to spread any further. We will end your reign of terror here and now."

"We're tired of your crap!" Selina snapped, her sultry demeanor gone like smoke. "You're going down."

"We are well aware of the strength of our bonds, and we will not falter," Clarissa added in a firm, but gentle voice.

"We'll bring you down," Varen promised, knives spinning around his fingers.

And with that, the battle commenced. The group fought as one, each using their unique abilities to their full advantage. Duran slashed through ice and bone, the weight of his armor a testament to his unbreakable will. Selina wove around the Master's minions, her pleasure magic turning them into more hindrances than help.

Varen danced and hid in the shadows, striking like a viper whenever the opportunity presented itself. Clarissa, her eyes shining with divine power, lent her strength to the others, her healing and support magic a constant tide of sustenance and protection.

Together, they defeated the icy Master, shattering his grip on the desert and freeing its people from his wicked power.

As the group emerged from the now-crumbled fortress, they knew their victory had come through teamwork, trust, and standing against the darkness.

"We did it!" Selina breathed, her voice bright with triumph.

"Of course." Duran's smile was hidden behind his helmet, but his eyes sparkled with pride. "Together, we can overcome anything."

"It is through unity and strength that we stand victorious," Clarissa said softly.

Varen rolled his eyes, but then grinned. "I guess you're right. Onto our next adventure - as a proper team."

entries.prompt:
The following line of code in a C++ project causes a compiler warning:

safe_strncpy(szBuffer,szBuffer+8,26);

szBuffer is of type "char *".

safe_strncpy is defined by the following:
#define safe_strncpy(a,b,n) do { strncpy((a),(b),(size_t)((n)-1)); (a)[(size_t)((n)-1)] = 0; } while (0)

The compiler warning is about the call to strncpy, and is as follows:
warning: 'char* strncpy(char*, const char*, size_t)' accessing 25 bytes at offsets 0 and 8 overlaps between 1 and 17 bytes at offset 8 [-Wrestrict]

Can you please explain the warning and suggest how to resolve it?
entries.response:
The compiler warning is saying that there is a memory overlap when calling the `strncpy` function within the `safe_strncpy` macro. Specifically, it's saying that the source string (szBuffer+8) and the destination string (szBuffer) overlap in memory by 1 to 17 bytes. In this context, strncpy behavior is undefined when the source and destination strings overlap like this.

To resolve this issue, you can use the `memmove` function, which is specifically designed to handle overlapping memory regions. Create a new macro with the safer implementation like this:

```cpp
#define safe_strncpy_memmove(a,b,n) do { memmove((a),(b),(size_t)((n)-1)); (a)[(size_t)((n)-1)] = 0; } while (0)
```

And then replace the original `safe_strncpy` call in your code with the new macro:

```cpp
safe_strncpy_memmove(szBuffer, szBuffer + 8, 26);
```

This will ensure that the overlapping memory is correctly handled, and you should no longer encounter the compiler warning.

entries.prompt: The author of the Gospel of Matthew with specific footnotes
entries.response:
The author of the Gospel of Matthew is traditionally believed to be Matthew, the tax collector and one of the twelve disciples of Jesus. However, the gospel itself is technically anonymous, as its author does not explicitly identify himself within the text. Most of what we know about the author comes from early Christian tradition and works from church fathers. 

Specific footnotes regarding the author:

1. The gospel is named after Matthew, likely because of church fathers such as Papias of Hierapolis, who stated that "Matthew compiled the sayings [of Jesus] in the Hebrew language, and everyone translated them as he was able" (in fragments preserved by Eusebius of Caesarea).
2. Biblical scholars now generally agree that the Gospel of Matthew was originally written in Greek, not Hebrew, which means the author could be someone from the early Christian community rather than Matthew himself.
3. The author of the Gospel of Matthew shows a deep understanding of Jewish customs, texts, and prophecies, implying that he was likely a Jewish-Christian.
4. The author occasionally refers to himself in the first person in other passages, using the pronoun "we" when describing events involving Jesus and the disciples (e.g., Matthew 9:9).
5. The Gospel of Matthew, like the other synoptic gospels (Mark and Luke), is believed to have been written between 70 AD and 85 AD.

entries.prompt:
The following characters are enemies the player faces in an action game. Give each of them an extensive movelist, including strikes, grapples, holds or submissions. Give those attacks creative names fitting the user. Describe their attacks and the effect they have on the player in great detail. Give each character a handful of names, randomly given to them by the game.

“Flexible Cheerleader”

“Naughty Gymnast”

“Assertive Stripper”

“Alluring Escort”
entries.response:
Character 1: "Flexible Cheerleader"

Names: Spirited Sally, Perky Penny, Leapin' Lily, Blitzin' Bonnie

Movelist:
1. Pom-Pom Whack-A-Thon: The Flexible Cheerleader swings her pom-poms rapidly to create a flurry of colorful, hard-hitting blows to the player.
2. Flexi-Kick Flurry: Demonstrating her extreme flexibility, the Cheerleader unleashes an array of high kicks targeting the player's upper body.
3. Toe Touch Takedown: With a powerful leap, she performs a toe touch in mid-air and slams both feet into the player, sending them flying.
4. Cartwheel Crush: She cartwheels at high speed towards the player, her legs fully extended, striking them multiple times as she flips by.
5. Pyramid Pummel: She jumps onto an invisible team of cheerleaders and assumes a pyramid formation briefly before launching herself at the player, delivering a potent dropkick.
6. Spirit Hold: By grabbing the player with both arms, she wraps her legs around them in a firm scissorhold – momentarily squeezing and stunning them before releasing.

Character 2: "Naughty Gymnast"

Names: Acrobat Amber, Tumbling Trish, Bodacious Becky, Nimble Nancy

Movelist:
1. Uneven Bar Barrage: The Naughty Gymnast conjures up uneven bars and performs a series of swift spins, releasing a barrage of energy projectiles toward the player.
2. Balance Beam Blitz: She uses her agility and skill to perform an elaborate balance beam routine, each step and jump sending a shockwave through the ground towards the player.
3. Pommel Horse Persuasion: Her hands grip a summoned pommel horse while she swings her legs around, using her powerful core strength to whip her legs at the player.
4. Leotard Lash: The Gymnast grabs a detached part of her leotard and uses it as a whip, striking the player from a distance.
5. Twisting Takedown: The Naughty Gymnast lunges towards the player, performing a series of twists and flips, before slamming into them with extraordinary force.
6. Flexible Flip Submission: She snares the player's arm or leg, using her own flexibility to wrap herself around them and applying immense pressure, momentarily immobilizing them.

Character 3: "Assertive Stripper"

Names: Dominant Denise, Whip-Crack Wendy, Savage Sasha, Brawling Bridget

Movelist:
1. High-Heel Hellstorm: The Assertive Stripper charges at the player, delivering a series of rapid high heel kicks to their body and head.
2. Pole Swingin' Smack: She summons a dance pole, spinning around it to gain momentum, and then launches herself at the player with a forceful punch or kick.
3. Lapdance Lethality: Grabbing the player from behind, the Assertive Stripper chokes them out with her leg while delivering a barrage of clubbing blows to their chest.
4. Stage Dive Slam: She leaps onto an invisible stage and performs a daring stage dive towards the player, slamming her heels into their chest.
5. Aerial Striptease Pounce: The Assertive Stripper suspends herself from an invisible aerial hoop, performing an enticing maneuver before leaping down, tackling the player.
6. Peeler Pin: She wraps herself around the player, trapping their arms and legs with her own, and then torques her body to apply immense pressure, momentarily immobilizing them.

Character 4: "Alluring Escort"

Names: Seductive Scarlet, Bewitching Bella, Tempting Tina, Captivating Celine

Movelist:
1. Smoldering Smack: The Alluring Escort dazzles the player with her beauty, sending a powerful slap across their face, briefly stunning them.
2. Mesmerizing Meltdown: Her gaze hypnotizes the player, leaving them temporarily dazed and unable to move, allowing her to follow up with a free strike.
3. Love Potion Persuasion: The Escort blows a kiss towards the player, releasing a mysterious gas that momentarily confuses them, causing them to move erratically.
4. Silken Scarf Strangle: Using her scarf as a makeshift whip, she swings it around to lash at the player or at close range, she wraps it around their neck, briefly choking them.
5. Stiletto Stab: The Alluring Escort takes a swift step forward and drives the heel of her stiletto into the player's body, causing a staggering amount of damage.
6. Sensual Submission: She grapples the player with a hug-like hold, using her charm to make them briefly powerless and unable to fight back, before suddenly tossing them across the battlefield.

entries.prompt: freedom planet What if Lilac Has The Clone Army (star wars) As His Abilities part 1
entries.response:
Part 1: The Discovery

After their latest victory against the forces of evil, the citizens of Avalice celebrate their heroes, Sash Lilac, Carol Tea, and Milla Basset. As the trio enjoys their moment of peace and revelry, they come across a hidden laboratory deep within the heart of the planet.

Inside the laboratory, they find what appears to be countless chambers filled with beings wearing armor similar to that of Avalice's ancient armies. As they explore further, they discover they have stumbled upon a hidden clone army from a long-forgotten civilization, masters of technology that somehow managed to genetically fuse Avalice's warriors with the combat abilities of a legendary army from a distant galaxy. Referred to as the "Star Warriors," these warriors bear armors and weapons resembling those of the Clone Army in the legendary Star Wars history.

With their abilities combined, Lilac and her friends now find themselves with an extraordinary power at their disposal - an entire army designed to protect Avalice against the darkest and most powerful of foes. But with great power comes great responsibility, and the trio must not only learn to harness and control this formidable new force but also prepare themselves for the inevitable dangers that will come their way.

While Lilac, Carol, and Milla train with their new clone army, they begin to learn more about the ancient civilization that created them. The Star Warriors were meant to be the protectors of Avalice, trained in martial arts, agility, and advanced weapon technology. Each Star Warrior possesses an array of combat skills, including abilities resembling those of the Jedi Order and the high-tech arsenal of the Clone Troopers from the Star Wars universe.

As news of this powerful force of warriors spreads throughout Avalice, nerves begin to fray. The forces of evil, who had been laying low to regain their strength, are now in full panic mode as they know Lilac and her friends pose an even more significant threat than ever before.

Meanwhile, Lilac's allies worry about the potential ramifications of wielding such a power. Some are concerned that these ancient warriors could bring terror to their homeworld if things get out of hand. It is clear that Lilac, Carole, and Milla must demonstrate wisdom and restraint while using their newfound strength, and be prepared to face the difficult and critical decisions that will come with their great power.

The adventure is just beginning for Lilac and her friends, as they learn more about the history and full extent of the Star Warriors' capabilities. With this ancient force at their command, they will be challenged in ways that were previously thought impossible. Their journey will bring them new allies, adversaries, and insights into their world and themselves.

In the next chapter, the first true test of the Star Warriors' prowess will be revealed. Avalice's eternal enemies launch a surprise attack, attempting to strike before Lilac and her allies can master the power provided by their new army. The stakes have never been higher, and the heroes of Freedom Planet must rise to an unprecedented level of strength and courage.

entries.prompt: Tell me a story about a man with excessively large teeth, who then had to wear complex braces for 20 years.
entries.response:
Once upon a time in a small village called Dentin, there lived a man named Timothy McNally with exceptionally large teeth. Timothy was born with teeth twice the size of a normal adult, which made eating, talking, and even smiling a difficult task for him.

Timothy was quite conscious of his teeth, which resulted in his speaking very little and avoiding any social interaction. Life was not easy; he had no friends or social connections. Timothy had always been alone, living in his small house as a gardener, growing vegetables, and selling them at the local market.

One day, a dental professional named Dr. Braxton Floss came to Dentin with an incredibly advanced knowledge of dentistry, which was rare during that time. Word got around that Dr. Floss had the ability to fix all manner of dental problems. Hearing about Dr. Floss's expertise, Timothy found a glimmer of hope to attain a normal life.

Timothy nervously made an appointment with Dr. Floss. During the exam, Dr. Floss assessed Timothy's teeth with great interest, intrigued by the challenge presented before him. After performing various tests and taking a lot of impressions, Dr. Floss presented his plan.

He proposed a highly complex brace system, one that had never been implemented before. Aware of the complications, Dr. Floss warned Timothy that this treatment would be painful and long-lasting – specifically, it would take twenty years. Filled with determination for change and hope, Timothy agreed to the treatment.

Through the years of the treatment, Timothy faced immense pain and discomfort, but he never lost hope. As he continued his gardening, the townspeople began to notice the change in Timothy. His teeth were gradually getting into place, and the excessive size seemed to be reducing ever so slightly.

With each passing year, Timothy began to smile more and interact with the villagers during his visits to the market. For the first time in his life, he started forming friendships and eventually even fell in love with a woman named Eileen.

Eileen was an incredibly empathetic woman who saw beyond Timothy's teeth, appreciating his gentle demeanor and resilience instead. As their relationship blossomed, Timothy was filled with joy – an emotion he had not experienced in a very long time.

Meanwhile, Timothy's friendship with Dr. Floss deepened as the two began bonding over shared struggles and aspirations. Dr. Floss became Timothy's mentor and closest confidante.

After twenty long years, Dr. Floss removed Timothy's complex braces. Timothy's teeth were now of normal size and aligned perfectly. Looking at his reflection in the mirror, Timothy finally saw a beautiful smile staring back at him. Tears of joy flowed down his cheeks as he realized that the dreams he had long thought unattainable had finally come true.

Timothy's life had transformed over those twenty years. He was no longer the recluse he had once been. Instead, he found himself surrounded by love, friendships, and opportunities he had never imagined possible.

It had taken perseverance and faith in Dr. Floss's expertise, but Timothy's efforts had paid off. This incredible journey taught Timothy the importance of believing in oneself and never giving up, no matter how long it might take to achieve one's dreams.

And so, Timothy, Eileen, Dr. Floss, and the entire village of Dentin celebrated this momentous occasion as Timothy's long journey finally reached its end. From that day forward, Timothy McNally would wear a bright and beautiful smile, emblematic of his newfound happiness and the beginning of the rest of his extraordinary life.

README.md
MiniGPT-4: Enhancing Vision-language Understanding with Advanced Large Language Models
Deyao Zhu* (On Job Market!), Jun Chen* (On Job Market!), Xiaoqian Shen, Xiang Li, and Mohamed Elhoseiny. *Equal Contribution

King Abdullah University of Science and Technology

    Colab YouTube

News
We now provide a pretrained MiniGPT-4 aligned with Vicuna-7B! The demo GPU memory consumption now can be as low as 12GB.

Online Demo
Click the image to chat with MiniGPT-4 around your images demo

Examples
find wild	write story
solve problem	write Poem
More examples can be found in the project page.

Introduction
MiniGPT-4 aligns a frozen visual encoder from BLIP-2 with a frozen LLM, Vicuna, using just one projection layer.
We train MiniGPT-4 with two stages. The first traditional pretraining stage is trained using roughly 5 million aligned image-text pairs in 10 hours using 4 A100s. After the first stage, Vicuna is able to understand the image. But the generation ability of Vicuna is heavilly impacted.
To address this issue and improve usability, we propose a novel way to create high-quality image-text pairs by the model itself and ChatGPT together. Based on this, we then create a small (3500 pairs in total) yet high-quality dataset.
The second finetuning stage is trained on this dataset in a conversation template to significantly improve its generation reliability and overall usability. To our surprise, this stage is computationally efficient and takes only around 7 minutes with a single A100.
MiniGPT-4 yields many emerging vision-language capabilities similar to those demonstrated in GPT-4.
overview

Getting Started
Installation
1. Prepare the code and the environment

Git clone our repository, creating a python environment and ativate it via the following command

git clone https://github.com/Vision-CAIR/MiniGPT-4.git
cd MiniGPT-4
conda env create -f environment.yml
conda activate minigpt4
2. Prepare the pretrained Vicuna weights

The current version of MiniGPT-4 is built on the v0 versoin of Vicuna-13B. Please refer to our instruction here to prepare the Vicuna weights. The final weights would be in a single folder in a structure similar to the following:

vicuna_weights
├── config.json
├── generation_config.json
├── pytorch_model.bin.index.json
├── pytorch_model-00001-of-00003.bin
...   
Then, set the path to the vicuna weight in the model config file here at Line 16.

3. Prepare the pretrained MiniGPT-4 checkpoint

Download the pretrained checkpoints according to the Vicuna model you prepare.

Checkpoint Aligned with Vicuna 13B	Checkpoint Aligned with Vicuna 7B
Downlad	Download
Then, set the path to the pretrained checkpoint in the evaluation config file in eval_configs/minigpt4_eval.yaml at Line 11.

Launching Demo Locally
Try out our demo demo.py on your local machine by running

python demo.py --cfg-path eval_configs/minigpt4_eval.yaml  --gpu-id 0
To save GPU memory, Vicuna loads as 8 bit by default, with a beam search width of 1. This configuration requires about 23G GPU memory for Vicuna 13B and 11.5G GPU memory for Vicuna 7B. For more powerful GPUs, you can run the model in 16 bit by setting low_resource to False in the config file minigpt4_eval.yaml and use a larger beam search width.

Thanks @WangRongsheng, you can also run our code on Colab

Training
The training of MiniGPT-4 contains two alignment stages.

1. First pretraining stage

In the first pretrained stage, the model is trained using image-text pairs from Laion and CC datasets to align the vision and language model. To download and prepare the datasets, please check our first stage dataset preparation instruction. After the first stage, the visual features are mapped and can be understood by the language model. To launch the first stage training, run the following command. In our experiments, we use 4 A100. You can change the save path in the config file train_configs/minigpt4_stage1_pretrain.yaml

torchrun --nproc-per-node NUM_GPU train.py --cfg-path train_configs/minigpt4_stage1_pretrain.yaml
A MiniGPT-4 checkpoint with only stage one training can be downloaded here (13B) or here (7B). Compared to the model after stage two, this checkpoint generate incomplete and repeated sentences frequently.

2. Second finetuning stage

In the second stage, we use a small high quality image-text pair dataset created by ourselves and convert it to a conversation format to further align MiniGPT-4. To download and prepare our second stage dataset, please check our second stage dataset preparation instruction. To launch the second stage alignment, first specify the path to the checkpoint file trained in stage 1 in train_configs/minigpt4_stage1_pretrain.yaml. You can also specify the output path there. Then, run the following command. In our experiments, we use 1 A100.

torchrun --nproc-per-node NUM_GPU train.py --cfg-path train_configs/minigpt4_stage2_finetune.yaml
After the second stage alignment, MiniGPT-4 is able to talk about the image coherently and user-friendly.

Acknowledgement
BLIP2 The model architecture of MiniGPT-4 follows BLIP-2. Don't forget to check this great open-source work if you don't know it before!
Lavis This repository is built upon Lavis!
Vicuna The fantastic language ability of Vicuna with only 13B parameters is just amazing. And it is open-source!
If you're using MiniGPT-4 in your research or applications, please cite using this BibTeX:

@article{zhu2023minigpt,
  title={MiniGPT-4: Enhancing Vision-Language Understanding with Advanced Large Language Models},
  author={Zhu, Deyao and Chen, Jun and Shen, Xiaoqian and Li, Xiang and Elhoseiny, Mohamed},
  journal={arXiv preprint arXiv:2304.10592},
  year={2023}
}
License
This repository is under BSD 3-Clause License. Many codes are based on Lavis with BSD 3-Clause License here.

entries.response: MiniGPT-4 is able to understand images by aligning a frozen visual encoder from BLIP-2 with a frozen large language model (LLM), Vicuna, using just one projection layer. The training process consists of two stages. In the first stage, the model is trained using about 5 million aligned image-text pairs; this enables Vicuna to understand the image. In the second stage, a small, high-quality dataset is used for fine-tuning, which aims to improve the model's generation reliability and overall usability. Through this approach, MiniGPT-4 gains vision-language understanding capabilities similar to those demonstrated in GPT-4.

Use active voice.And then write to describe the following examples based on the short sub-heading of specific design. Write the sub-heading in html h4 heading. And then followed with one paragraph of detailed description about its design or meaning. Don’t apply html tag to the paragraph.

Heart of thorns hand tattoo
Jesus with thorns tattoo
Virgin Mary hand tattoo
A cherub and Jesus
A dagger pierced in a sacred heart with thorns
entries.response:
Faith and religious hand tattoos hold a special place for many spiritual individuals. These designs not just serve as a constant reminder of their beliefs, but also beautifully capture the essence of their faith. As a form of self-expression, religious hand tattoos often depict various meaningful symbols and figures. From sacred hearts with thorns to divine portraits of Jesus and the Virgin Mary, these intricate tattoos are a remarkable blend of art and spirituality.

Heart of Thorns Hand Tattoo

The heart of thorns hand tattoo features a detailed heart with a crown of thorns wrapped around it. This design symbolizes Christ's sacrifice and the love he holds for humankind. The thorns represent pain and suffering, while the heart signifies the forgiveness and mercy that Jesus offers.

Jesus with Thorns Tattoo

This hand tattoo portrays a striking image of Jesus Christ with a crown of thorns on his head. It is a solemn reminder of the immense pain he endured for the sake of humanity’s redemption and serves as a representation of unwavering faith.

Virgin Mary Hand Tattoo

This design captures the comforting presence and divine beauty of Mother Mary. Often depicted with hands in prayer or holding the infant Jesus, the Virgin Mary hand tattoo reminds us of her compassion, love, and the central role she plays in Christianity.

A Cherub and Jesus

This intricate tattoo highlights a touching image of a cherub (a divine messenger) alongside Jesus Christ, signifying divine protection and guidance. This design is both awe-inspiring and serves as a constant reminder of the love and grace that surround believers in their faith.

A Dagger Pierced in a Sacred Heart with Thorns

Featuring a sacred heart surrounded by thorns and pierced by a dagger, this tattoo is a powerful symbol of Christ’s unyielding love and sacrifice. It represents the pain and suffering Jesus endured and his ultimate triumph, thus evoking deep emotions for those with a strong connection to their faith.
